snippet.title: Carte Blanche — Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Carte Blanche! Learn and play five classic card games with the help of a friendly raven named Blanche.

Pull up a seat and let Blanche share with you some of her favorites: Cribbage, Gin Rummy, Spades, Cassino, and Spite & Malice. The more you play, the more pennies you'll earn, and maybe you'll even get some wonderful prizes from Blanche's collection. (She assures us they're worthwhile prizes, but to each their own.)

Carte Blanche is available now on:
• Playdate Catalog (https://play.date/games/carte-blanche)
• Itch (https://howseven.itch.io/carte-blanche)

And while you're visiting, why not pick up some official Carte Blanche merch: https://shop.howseven.com/collections/carte-blanche

For more information, check out https://www.carteblanche.cards
